title: Common Criteria Related to Monitoring of Controls

item.text: Monitoring system configurations used to monitor system performance, capacity, utilization, and unusual system activity
As evidence, you can provide Monitoring system configurations.
Monitoring system notification configurations showing which individuals are notified when monitoring thresholds have been exceeded
As evidence, you can provide Monitoring system notifications.
Screenshot showing the antivirus software dashboard console
As evidence, you can provide Antivirus systems.
Most recently completed backup restoration test
As evidence, you can provide Backup restoration test.
Provide evidence of incremental and full backups/snapshots performed for a sample of production databases.
As evidence, you can provide Backup Configurations.
Please provide the URL to VPN user access review (sample).
For new users that are provisioned in the system requestor, approver, provisoning details are available ( date, person)
Alerts from Monitoring Software for any attempt to misuse is enabled and events are gathered and attended. Logs of access to system is available
User Access Changes , requests, approvals , provision and communication
Segregation of duties in accesses ( dev, build, test, deploy )
Review of user profiles - admins and non admins for all user details
Review Employee Termination , last log in after exit date
Communicate Between Departments about access initiation, changes
Unused profiles are disabled or inactivated after certain duration
Documentation of Requests DeProvision and Changes in  the ticket - who , when , what, why, how
How many times forgot password used? And who
How many accounts we have - total? Vs How many employees we have?
Temporary and emergency accounts should be removed or disabled automatically
The organization should require users to log out after a predefined period
Limit the use of shared/group account credentials
As evidence, you can provide VPN user access review (sample).
VPN user access reviews for a sample of months or quarters

Most recently completed internal and external vulnerability scan results/report If vulnerability scans are performed monthly or quarterly, the auditor will haphazardly select a sample of scans
As evidence, you can provide Vulnerability scan(s).
Most recently completed annual internal and external penetration test results/report
As evidence, you can provide Penetration testing.

For an example deviation or gap identified from the tool/system used to monitor/assess key systems, tools, and applications for compliance, evidence (e.g. incident ticket, emails) that the deviation was documented, investigated, and addressed
As evidence, you can provide Penetration testing.

For an example vulnerability identified from the vulnerability scans or penetration tests, evidence (e.g. incident ticket, emails) that the vulnerability was documented, investigated, and addressed using one of the following strategies: - remediate the identified vulnerability; - avoid the risk posed by the identified vulnerability; - mitigate the risk posed by the identified vulnerability; - transfer the risk posed by the identified vulnerability; or - accept the risk posed by the identified vulnerability
As evidence, you can provide Risk mitigation sourced from vuln scan/pentest.

Most recently completed internal compliance assessment performed by internal audit including evidence that: - key systems, applications, and tools were identified and documented - the key systems, applications, and tools were assessed for compliance against documented policies and procedures - deviations and control gaps were documented - risks were identified and documented relating to the deviations and controls gaps - identified risks were addressed / mitigated - remediation efforts and corrective actions were communicated and assigned to process owners - management reviewed/signed off on the compliance assessment - evidence (e.g. meeting minutes, reports, notes, emails, PowerPoint deck, emails, etc.) that executive management assessed the results of compliance, control and risk assessments, including reviewing the identified high risk vulnerabilities, deviations and controls gaps and control gaps were addressed in a timely manner.
As evidence, you can provide Internal compliance assessment.
Evidence of tool/system (e.g. Qualys) used to monitor/assess key systems, tools, and applications for compliance against documented policies and procedures
As evidence, you can provide Tool/system to monitor/assess system configurations.
Common Criteria Related to Monitoring of Controls
